textAfterTable: Hawthorn Woods IL, US 161 posts #1. "RE: Lightroom and Camera Raw" | In response to Reply # 0 Garen T Registered since 20th Jan 2013 Mon 04-Feb-13 12:51 AM First, Lightroom is built around Camera RAW, which is What photoshop uses as its image processor. Lightroom is built purely for photo editing and takes all the photo editing parts of Photoshop and puts them in a simple yet powerful package Lightroom imports NEF's with ease, and without having to do anything special. Lightroom is also a cataloging engine, where you can view, sort, tag, and search all your images. Garen www.garentphotography.com http://www.flickr.com/photos/garent/ Visit my Nikonians gallery.
